<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #19754 (wallet, gui: Reload previously loaded wallets on startup by achow101)
* #19619 (Remove wallet.dat path handling f

Rebased 771b0e36de7dad225e9b664a9fd1c2a55f94ed8b -> 05875a8bc8e500322f9a54f07d60e9ed1e295282 ([`pr/wclient.1`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/wclient.1) -> [`pr/wclient.2`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/wclient.2), [compare](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/compare/pr/wclient.1-rebase..pr/wclient.2)) due to conflict with #17993, and including splashscreen ini
A regression introduced in this PR fixed in https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/102.
nit, inline `SplashScreen::ConnectWallet` here - remove from header and reduce `ENABLE_WALLET` usage.

re: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19099#discussion_r450522450

> nit, add the usual comment.

Added doxygen comment

re: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19099#discussion_r450522201

> nit, inline `SplashScreen::ConnectWallet` here - remove from header and reduce `ENABLE_WALLET` usage.

Inlined in followup commit

Why ignore returned value (even if only `true` at this point)?

```suggestion
        if (!AppInitInterfaces(node)) return false;
```
Î¼Nit: This empty line looks nice, IMO.
nit in e4f435047121886edb6e6a6c4e4998e44ed2e36a:\n\nWould be good to assert `!node.wallet_client` to avoid accidentally re-seating the reference

```suggestion
    //! List of all chain clients (wallet client or other client) connected to node.
```

nit in e4f4350:

could simply say that there is at most a single wallet client in this list, not one for each wallet.
doc-nit: Should the docs say that this is not allowed to be called in a non-wallet build or when the wallet is disabled?
